title: Week 11 Liquidity Mining Proposal
body:
This marks the 11th week of liquidity mining on Balancer v2. The Ballers propose the following changes which will go into effect 00:00 UTC Monday, August 2nd, 2021.
## ETHEREUM POOLS
There are no changes this week.
## POLYGON POOLS
Remove a Tier 3 slot for 2,500 BAL, and add a Tier 4 slot for 1,000 BAL to WMATIC/USDC/QI/BAL/MAI. This pool will now receive 1,000 BAL per week.

Remove a Tier 4 slot for 1,000 BAL, and add a Tier 3 slot for 2,500 BAL to WMATIC/USDC/WETH/BAL This pool will now receive 7,500 BAL per week.

Link to pull request: https://github.com/balancer-labs/frontend-v2/pull/611
author: 0x176001586fF17ad625Dc387557631710cf485f72
